title: Neural Motivator
desc: During the status phase, draw 2 action cards instead of 1.

title: Magen Defense Grid
desc: You may exhaust this card at the start of a round of ground combat on a planet that contains 1 or more of your units that have Planetary Shield; your opponent cannot make combat rolls this combat round.

title: Antimass Deflectors
desc:
Your ships can move into and through asteroid fields
When other playersâ€™ units use SPACE CANNON against your units, apply -1 to the result of each die roll

title: Sarween Tools
desc: When 1 or more of your units use Production, reduce the combined cost of the produced units by 1

title: Dark Energy Tap
desc:
After you perform a tactical action in a system that contains a frontier token, if you have 1 or more ships in that system, explore that token
Your ships can retreat into adjacent systems that do not contain other players' units, even if you do not have units or control planets in that system.

title: Plasma Scoring
desc: When 1 or more of your units use Bombardment or Space Cannon, 1 of those units may roll 1 additional die

title: Dreadnought II
subTitle: Type IV Drive
desc: This unit cannot be destroyed by "Direct Hit" action cards.

title: PDS II
subTitle: Deep Space Cannon
desc: You may use this unit's SPACE CANNON against ships that are adjacent to this unit's system.

title: Bioplasmosis
desc: At the end of the status phase, you may remove any number of infantry from planets you control and place them on 1 or more planets you control in the same or adjacent systems

title: Sling Relay
desc: ACTION: Exhaust this card to produce 1 ship in any system that contains one of your space docks

title: Gravity Drive
desc: After you activate a system, apply +1 to the move value of 1 of your ships during this tactical action

title: Dacxive Animators
desc: After you win a ground combat, you may place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on that planet

title: Valefar Assimilator X
desc: When you would gain another players technology using 1 of your faction ability, you may place the "X" assimilator token on a faction technology owned by that player instead.  While that token is on a technology, this card gains that technology's text.  You cannot place an assimilator token on technology that already has an assimilator token.

title: Valefar Assimilator Y
desc: When you would gain another players technology using 1 of your faction ability, you may place the "Y" assimilator token on a faction technology owned by that player instead.  While that token is on a technology, this card gains that technology's text.  You cannot place an assimilator token on technology that already has an assimilator token.

title: Graviton Laser System
desc: You may exhaust this card before 1 or more of your units uses Space Cannon; hits produced by those units must be assigned to non-fighter ships if able

title: Bio-Stims
desc: You may exhaust this card at the end of your turn to ready 1 of your planets that has a technology specialty or 1 of your other technologies

title: Predictive Intelligence
desc:
At the end of your turn, you may exhaust this card to redistribute your command tokens.
 When you cast votes during the agenda phase, you may cast 3 additional votes; if you do, and the outcome you voted for is not resolved, exhaust this card.

title: Psychoarchaeology
desc:
You can use technology specialties on planets you control without exhausting them, even if those planets are exhausted
 During the Action Phase, you can exhaust planets you control that have technology specialties to gain 1 Trade Good.

title: AI Development Algorithm
desc:
When you research a unit upgrade technology, you may exhaust this card to ignore any 1 prerequisite
 When 1 or more of your units use Production, you may exhaust this card to reduce the combined cost of the produced units by the number of unit upgrade technologies that you own.

title: Scanlink Drone Network
desc: When you activate a system, you may explore 1 planet in that system which contains 1 or more of your units.

title: Self Assembly Routines
desc:
After 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION, you may exhaust this card to place 1 mech from your reinforcements on a planet you control in that system.
 After 1 of your mechs is destroyed, gain 1 trade good.

title: Letani Warrior II
subTitle: Infantry
desc: After this unit is destroyed, roll 1 die. If the result is 6 or greater, place the unit on this card. At the start of your next turn, place each unit that is on this card on a planet you control in your home system.

title: Floating Factory I
subTitle: Space Dock
desc: This unit is placed in a space area instead of on a planet.  This unit can move and retreat as if it were a ship.  If this unit is blockaded, it is destroyed.

title: Floating Factory II
subTitle: Space Dock
desc: This unit is placed in a space area instead of on a planet.  This unit can move and retreat as if it were a ship.  If this unit is blockaded, it is destroyed.

title: Prototype War Sun I
subTitle: War Sun
desc: Other players' units in this system lose Planetary Shield.

title: Prototype War Sun II
subTitle: War Sun
desc: Other players' units in this system lose Planetary Shield.

title: Spec Ops II
subTitle: Infantry
desc: After this unit is destroyed, roll 1 die. If the result is 5 or greater, place the unit on this card. At the start of your next turn, place each unit that is on this card on a planet you control in your home system.

title: Super-Dreadnought II
subTitle: Dreadnought
desc: This unit cannot be destroyed by "Direct Hit" action cards.

title: Hybrid Crystal Fighter II
subTitle: Fighter
desc: This unit may move without being transported.  Each fighter in excess of your ships' capacity counts as 1/2 of a ship against your fleet pool.

title: Exotrireme II
subTitle: Dreadnought
desc:
This unit cannot be destroyed by "Direct Hit" action cards.
 After a round of space combat, you may destroy this unit to destroy up to 2 ships in this system.

title: Strike Wing Alpha II
subTitle: Destroyer
desc: When this unit uses ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE, each result of 9 or 10 also destroys 1 of your opponent's infantry in the space area of the active system.

title: Crimson Legionnaire I
subTitle: Infantry
desc: After this unit is destroyed, gain 1 commodity or convert 1 of your commodities to a trade good.

title: Crimson Legionnaire II
subTitle: Infantry
desc: After this unit is destroyed, gain 1 commodity or convert 1 of your commodities to a trade good. Then, place the unit on this card. At the start of your next turn, place each unit that is on this card on a planet you control in your home system.

title: Hel Titan I
subTitle: PDS
desc: This unit is treated as both a structure and a ground force. It cannot be transported.

title: Hel Titan II
subTitle: PDS
desc:
This unit is treated as both a structure and a ground force. It cannot be transported.
 You may use this unit's SPACE CANNON against ships that are adjacent to this unit's system.

title: Dimensional Tear I
subTitle: Space Dock
desc:
This system is a gravity rift; your ships do not roll for this gravity rift.
 Place a dimensional tear token beneath this unit as a reminder.
 Up to 6 fighters in this system do not count against your ships' capacity.

title: Dimensional Tear II
subTitle: Space Dock
desc:
This system is a gravity rift; your ships do not roll for this gravity rift.
 Place a dimensional tear token beneath this unit as a reminder.
 Up to 12 fighters in this system do not count against your ships' capacity.

title: Memoria II
subTitle: Flagship
desc: You may treat this unit as if it were adjacent to systems that contain one or more of your mechs.

title: Fighter II
subTitle: Advanced Fighters
desc:
This unit may move without being transported.
 Fighters in excess of your ships' capacity count against your fleet pool

title: Infantry II
subTitle: Gen Synthesis
desc: After this unit is destroyed, roll 1 die. If the result is 6 or greater, place the unit on this card. At the start of your next turn, place each unit that is on this card on a planet you control in your home system

title: Space Dock II
subTitle: Enviro Compensator
desc:
This unit's PRODUCTION value is equal to 4 more than the resource value of this planet.
 Up to 3 fighters in this system do not count against your ships' capacity.

title: War Sun
subTitle: Mobile Base
desc: Other players' units in this system lose their Planetary Shield Ability.

title: Aerie Hololattice
desc: Other players cannot move ships through systems that contain your structures. Each planet that contains 1 or more of your structures gains the PRODUCTION 1 ability as if it were a unit

title: Non-Euclidean Shielding
desc: When 1 of your units uses SUSTAIN DAMAGE, cancel 2 hits instead of 1

title: Chaos Mapping
desc:
Other players cannot activate asteroid fields that contain 1 or more of your ships.
 At the start of your turn during the action phase, you may produce 1 unit in a system that contains at least 1 of your units that has Production.

title: Magmus Reactor
desc:
Your ships can move into supernovas.
 After 1 or more of your units use Production in a system that either contains a war sun or is adjacent to a supernova, gain 1 trade good

title: Production Biomes
desc: ACTION: Exhaust this card and spend 1 token from your strategy pool to gain 4 trade goods and choose 1 other player; that player gains 2 trade goods

title: Quantum Datahub Node
desc: At the end of the strategy phase, you may spend 1 token from your strategy pool and give another player 3 of your trade goods.  If you do, give 1 of your strategy cards to that player and take 1 of their strategy cards

title: Aetherstream
desc: After you or one of your neighbors activates a system that is adjacent to an anomaly, you may apply +1 to the move value of all of that player's ships during this tactical action

title: Voidwatch
desc: After a player moves ships into a system that contains 1 or more of your units, they must give you 1 promissory note from their hand, if able

title: Wormhole Generator
desc: At the start of the status phase, place or move a Creuss wormhole token into either a system that contains a planet you control or a non-home system that does not contain another player's ships

title: Dimensional Splicer
desc: At the start of space combat in a system that contains a wormhole and 1 or more of your ships, you may produce 1 hit and assign it to 1 of your opponent's ships

title: Inheritance Systems
desc: You may exhaust this card and spend 2 resources when you research a technology; ignore all of that technology's prerequisites

title: Genetic Recombination
desc: You may exhaust this card before a player casts votes; that player must cast at least 1 vote for an outcome of your choice or remove 1 token from their fleet pool and return it to their reinforcements

title: Salvage Operations
desc: After you win or lose a space combat, gain 1 trade good; if you won the combat, you may also produce 1 ship in that system of any ship type that was destroyed during the combat

title: Mirror Computing
desc: When you spend trade goods, each trade good is worth 2 resources or influence instead of 1

title: Supercharge
desc: At the start of a combat round, you may exhaust this card to apply +1 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls during this combat round

title: Pre-Fab Arcologies
desc: After you explore a planet, ready that planet

title: Temporal Command Suite
desc: After any player's agent becomes exhausted, you may exhaust this card to ready that agent; if you ready another player's agent you may perform a transaction with that player

title: Valkyrie Particle Weave
desc: After making combat rolls during a round of ground combat, if your opponent produced 1 or more hits, you produce 1 additional hit

title: E-Res Siphons
desc: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, gain 4 trade goods

title: Spacial Conduit Cylinder
desc: You may exhaust this card after you activate a system that contains 1 or more of your units; that system is adjacent to all other systems that contain 1 or more of your units during this activation

title: Vortex
desc: ACTION: Exhaust this card to choose another player's non-structure unit in a system that is adjacent to 1 or more of your space docks. Capture 1 unit of that type from that player's reinforcements

title: Lazax Gate Folding
desc: During your tactical actions, if you do not control Mecatol Rex, treat its system as if it contains both an alpha and beta wormhole. ACTION: If you control Mecatol Rex, exhaust this card to place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on Mecatol Rex

title: Hegemonic Trade Policy
desc: Exhaust this card when 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION; swap the resource and influence values of 1 planet you control during that use of Production

title: Nullification Field
desc: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, you may exhaust this card and spend 1 token from your strategy pool; immediately end that player's turn

title: Instinct Training
desc: You may exhaust this card and spend 1 token from your strategy pool when another player plays an action card; cancel that action card

title: Impulse Core
desc: At the start of a space combat, you may destroy 1 of your cruisers or destroyers in the active system to produce 1 hit against your opponent's ships; that hit must be assigned by your opponent to 1 of their non-fighters ships if able

title: Yin Spinner
desc: After 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION, place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on a planet you control in that system

title: Transparasteel Plating
desc: During your turn of the action phase, players that have passed cannot play action cards

title: Mageon Implants
desc: ACTION: Exhaust this card to look at another player's hand of action cards. Choose 1 of those cards and add it to your hand

title: Hyper Metabolism
desc: During the status phase, gain 3 command tokens instead of 2

title: X-89 Bacterial Weapon
desc: ACTION: Exhaust this card and choose 1 planet in a system that contains 1 or more of your ships that have BOMBARDMENT; destroy all infantry on that planet

title: Fleet Logistics
desc: During each of your turns of the action phase, you may perform 2 actions instead of 1

title: Light/Wave Deflector
desc: Your ships can move through systems that contain other playerâ€™s ships

title: Transit Diodes
desc: You may exhaust this card at the start of your turn during the action phase; remove up to 4 of your ground forces from the game board and place them on 1 or more planets you control.

title: Integrated Economy
desc: After you gain control of a planet, you may produce any number of units on that planet that have a combined cost equal to or less than that planetâ€™s resource value.

title: Duranium Armor
desc: During each combat round, after you assign hits to your units, repair 1 of your damaged units that did not use Sustain Damage during this combat round

title: Assault Cannon
desc: At the start of a space combat in a system that contains 3 or more of your non-fighter ships, your opponent must destroy 1 of their non-fighter ships

title: Neuroglaive
desc: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, that player removes 1 token from their fleet pool and returns it to their reinforcements

title: L4 Disruptors
desc: During an invasion, units cannot use SPACE CANNON against your units

title: Magmus Reactor Î©
desc:
Your ships can move into supernovas.
 Each supernova that contains 1 or more of your units gains the PRODUCTION 5 ability as if it were 1 of your units.

title: Wormhole Generator Î©
desc: ACTION: Exhaust this card to place or move a Creuss wormhole token into either a system that contains a planet you control or a non-home system that does not contain another player's ships.

title: Yin Spinner Î©
desc: After you produce units, place up to 2 infantry from your reinforcements on any planet you control or in any space area that contains 1 or more of your ships.

title: Magen Defense Grid Î©
desc: At the start of ground combat on a planet that contains 1 or more of your structures, you may produce 1 hit and assign it to 1 of your opponent's ground forces.

title: X-89 Bacterial Weapon Î©
desc: After 1 or more of your units use BOMBARDMENT against a planet, if at least 1 of your opponent's infantry was destroyed, you may destroy all of your opponent's infantry on that planet.

title: I.I.H.Q. Modernization
desc:
You are neighbors with all players that have units or control planets in or adjacent to the Mecatol Rex system.
Gain the Custodia Vigilia planet card and its legendary planet ability card. You cannot lose these cards, and this card cannot have an X or Y assimilator token placed on it.

title: Agency Supply Network
desc: Whenever you resolve one of your PRODUCTION abilities, you may resolve an additional one of your PRODUCTION abilities in any system; the additional use does not trigger this ability.
